summary.span: 表示控制項，此控制項是由可以將容器的顯示區分成兩個可以調整大小之面板的可移動軸所組成。

span.span: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將控制項加入兩個可調整大小的面板，以及您可以新增其他控制項新增至現有來建立許多可調整大小的面板顯示區域。You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other controls to existing panels to create many resizable display areas. 使用將顯示區域的容器控制項 (例如)，並允許使用者調整大小的控制項新增至面板。Use the control to divide the display area of a container (such as a ) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the panels. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移過分隔器，表示游標變成內的控制項控制項可以調整大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the control can be resized. > [!NOTE] > 舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]僅支援控制項。Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the control. 在設計階段，也可以簡化控制項位置。 also eases control placement at design time. 例如，若要建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管視窗，加入控制對並設定其屬性設`DockStyle.Fill`。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 新增若要控制並設定其屬性設`DockStyle.Fill`。Add a control to the and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 若要完成版面配置，加入控制項，並將其屬性設`DockStyle.Fill`能夠佔用剩餘的空間上。To complete the layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the . 在執行階段，使用者可以再調整大小兩個控制項都使用分隔器的寬度。At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter. 使用屬性來指定控制項不應該調整連同或其他容器。Use the property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the or other container. 使用指定分隔器開始您的表單上的位置。Use to specify where the splitter starts on your form. 使用指定多少像素的分隔器移動一次。Use to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time. 預設值為為一個像素。The default for is one pixel. 使用並來指定如何關閉的分隔列可移動的外邊緣面板。Use and to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a panel. 預設面板的大小下限為 25 像素。The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels. 使用屬性來指定水平方向。Use the property to specify horizontal orientation. 預設方向為垂直。The default orientation of the is vertical. 使用屬性，以指定的框線樣式協調其與您加入的控制項的框線樣式的框線樣式和。Use the property to specify the border style of the and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的垂直和水平。The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal . 垂直分隔器移動 10 像素為單位。The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments. 左的面板的垂直包含控制項，以及其右面板包含水平。The left panel of the vertical contains a control, and its right panel contains a horizontal . 這兩個面板的水平填滿控制項，以及的上方面板定義為，讓它不會調整容器的大小時不調整大小。Both panels of the horizontal are filled with controls, and the top panel is defined as a so that it does not resize when you resize the container. 移動垂直分割引發事件，以在此範例中的資料指標樣式變更。Moving the vertical splitter raises the event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style. 移動分隔器停止時，會引發事件。The event is raised when you stop moving the splitter. 這被以在這個範例還原成預設的資料指標樣式。This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default. remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動捲動邊界是任何子控制項和可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 大小也會加入可捲動的控制項，以決定是否需要捲軸中包含任何子控制項的大小。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed. 屬性時，可捲動父控制項調整大小時，或個別子控制項已導入檢視中，會評估，以及用來判斷是否必須顯示捲軸。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 停駐的控制項是以判斷是否必須顯示捲軸的計算會排除。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 從子控制項的邊緣的距離，以可捲動父控制項是否指派給的值小於屬性和屬性設定為`true`，會顯示適當的捲軸。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的內容可能會因許多原因而; 變更包括顯示資料的變更;加入的子控制項;版面配置和邊框間距變更;或系統字型、 語言或解析的變更。The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則調整大小，會自動以包含它的內容，雖然它會永遠不會調整大小必須小於其原始。If the property is set to `true`, the will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original . 這項作業會維護控制項的。This operation will maintain the control's . 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性會變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以停駐可以固定到其容器，或您的任何邊緣容器的所有邊緣，讓完全填滿容器。You can dock a to any edge of its container, or you can dock a to all edges of the container so that the entirely fills the container. 例如，將此屬性設定為要附加的左邊的緣至其容器左邊緣。For example, set this property to to attach the left edge of the to the left edge of its container. 控制項停駐在疊置順序。Controls are docked in z-order. > [!NOTE] > 疊置順序對應深度維度的畫面上，而 x 順序和 y 訂單對應到的水平和垂直面向，分別。The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively. 疊置順序會定義哪些物件前，會出現在控制項或 windows 可以重疊的或佔用相同的空間，在螢幕上。Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen. 控制項或最上層的疊置順序的視窗會顯示在所有其他控制項或 windows，並且由索引中的 0 參考屬性。A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the property. 控制項或視窗底部的疊置順序的所有其他控制項或 windows 的下方隨即出現，並參考的索引`(Controls.Count-1)`在屬性。A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the property. 如需錨定和停駐控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 使用 Windows Form 建立 Multipane 使用者介面](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md)。For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示垂直分割其屬性設定為`Fill`。The following code example shows a vertical splitter whose property is set to `Fill`. 此外，也會顯示垂直分割的其他基本屬性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定垂直的左方的面板或 水平的上方面板。Use the property to configure the left panel of a vertical or the top panel of a horizontal . 比方說，您可以指定 [面板] 中的最小值的變更屬性，設定屬性設`Panel1`，讓容器可以調整大小，或您可以取得或設定面板時，面板會維持相同大小和屬性。For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the property, set the property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's and properties. 您無法移除從。You cannot remove from the . > [!NOTE] > 如果或包含任何可以接收焦點，在焦點仍在分隔器按一下時其上的控制項。If or contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked. 若要將焦點移到或，將屬性設為 0，屬性為 1。To change the focus to or , set the property of to 0 and the property of to 1. 如果或包含任何可以接收焦點，在焦點仍在分隔器按一下時其上的控制項。If or contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked. 若要將焦點移到或，將屬性設為 0，屬性為 1。To change the focus to or , set the property of to 0 and the property of to 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用禁止分隔器移動太靠近左邊緣或上邊緣的容器來的屬性。Use the property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the left or top edge of the container. 比方說，您可能想要避免顯示區域的一部分從覆蓋。For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a from being covered. 如果屬性是`Vertical`（預設值），傳回的最小距離單位為像素的分隔器左邊緣。If the property is `Vertical` (the default), returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of . 如果屬性是`Horizontal`，傳回的上邊緣像素為單位的分隔器的最小距離。If the property is `Horizontal`, returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示垂直分隔器位置的最小大小（左的面板） 設定為 30 個像素，這現在是分隔器可以從容器的左邊緣的距離最小值。The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of (the left panel) is set to 30 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the left edge of the container. 此外，也會顯示垂直分割的其他基本屬性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理對話方塊按鍵字元，例如索引標籤、 向左鍵、 向右箭號，向上鍵和向下箭號前置處理的訊息，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW. 不會處理包含 ALT 或控制項的修飾詞的索引鍵。Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法會指示控制項未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只是傳送至父代的字元方法，則傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，才執行的階段會呼叫這個方法。The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

permission.span: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回指出它已處理的索引鍵。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 針對控制項，也就是呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理的索引鍵方法應該傳回。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控制項將很少，鮮，需要覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以取得相對於分隔器的高度與寬度。Use to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the . ， ， ， ，並事件處理常式繪製移動時顯示的分隔器的目前位置。The , , , , and event handlers draw the to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving. 意義值不盡相同，取決於。The meaning of the values vary depending on the . 輸出格式`{X, Y, Width, Height}`。The output of is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`. 下表顯示的意義垂直和水平分隔器中的值。The following table shows the meaning of the values for vertical and horizontal splitters. |維度Dimension|垂直分隔器Vertical Splitter|水平分割Horizontal Splitter| |---------------|-----------------------|-------------------------| |XX|單位為像素的分隔器距離左邊緣的距離。The distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of the .|這個值永遠為 0，表示分隔器為排清的左邊緣的水平分隔器。This value is always 0 for a horizontal splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the left edge of the .| |YY|這個值永遠為 0 代表垂直分隔器，表示分隔器為排清的上邊緣與。This value is always 0 for a vertical splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the top edge of the .|單位為像素的分隔器從上邊緣的距離。The distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of the .| |寬度Width|分隔器寬度。The width of the splitter.|起的分隔器，其相當於高度高度控制項。The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the control.| |高度Height|起的分隔器，其相當於高度高度控制項。The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the control.|分隔器寬度。The width of the splitter.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，會將輸入的焦點設定格式的定位順序中的下一個控制項。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form. 設定至`true`以分隔器提供輸入的焦點，使其可以使用方向鍵，以及滑鼠移動。Set to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，設定要`false`排除分隔器和控制項中所包含的任何從定位順序中的控制項集合。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the from the collection of controls in the tab order. 若要啟用使用 TAB 鍵取得焦點的控制項，請建立繼承自控制項。To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from . 建立新的屬性，名為`TabStop`，並覆寫方法。Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the method. 下列範例示範如何完成這項作業。The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this. [!code-csharp[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/vb/module1.vb#1)] 您可以藉由設定控制項的處理 索引標籤順序屬性值。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.
